name: py-pyvcf
description: A Variant Call Format reader for Python

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-counter
dependencies.description:
Counter package defines the "counter.Counter" class similar to bags or
multisets in other languages.

dependencies.name: py-ordereddict
dependencies.description:
A drop-in substitute for Py2.7's new collections. OrderedDict that works
in Python 2.4-2.6.

dependencies.name: py-unittest2
dependencies.description:
unittest2 is a backport of the new features added to the unittest
testing framework in Python 2.7 and onwards.

dependent_to.name: py-whatshap
dependent_to.description:
WhatsHap is a software for phasing genomic variants using DNA sequencing
reads, also called read-based phasing or haplotype assembly.

dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam
dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.

dependent_to.name: py-metasv
dependent_to.description:
An accurate and integrative structural-variant caller for next
generation sequencing
